85  static inline float progress(){ return _progress; }
86  static inline void set_progress(float p){
87  _progress = p;
88  if( _progress < 0.0 ){
89  _progress = 0.0;
90  } else if( _progress > 1.0 ){
91  _progress = 1.0;
92  }
93  }
94  static inline uint8_t task(void){ return _task; }
95  static inline uint8_t tasks(void){ return _tasks; }
96  static inline void set_task(uint8_t t){ _task = t; }
97  static inline void set_tasks(uint8_t t){ _tasks = t; }
